### Preperation

library(tidyverse)

### Load and clean data
```{r}
data_pups = read_csv("./FAS_pups.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>%  
  gather(key = index, value = PD_outcome, pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  filter(!is.na(PD_outcome)) 

head(data_pups)
```
